item.title: 2 Weeks of Claude Code for Me
item.description: I’m busy all the time with the Critter Stack tools, answering questions on Slack or Discord, and trying like hell to make JasperFx Software go. I’ve admittedly had my head in the sand a bit about the AI tools for coding, thinking that what I do being relatively novel for the most part and that … Continue reading 2 Weeks of Claude Code for Me → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.com/2026/02/14/2-weeks-of-claude-code-for-me/
